OH.NAME: SUCCOR AND WARMTH
OH.DESCRIPTION: Paul Bookson - Sabbath: The Jewish day of rest. It begins on Friday evening and ends on Saturday evening.

OH.NAME: ONE FRIDAY EVENING
OH.DESCRIPTION: Miriam Aaron - Shamos: A synagogue official who provides various services and often manages day-to-day affairs. - Edward Smith sings “Lekhah Dodi” ("Come My Beloved"), a liturgical song recited Friday at dusk to welcome the Shabbat.

OH.NAME: HERRINGS AND CAKE
OH.DESCRIPTION: Gussie Dubrin, Paul Bookson, Max Smith - Edward Smith recites the “Kiddush” ("Sanctification"), a blessing recited over wine to sanctify the Shabbat and Jewish holidays.
